verbose_text: The best characterized reporter is based on the herpes simplex virus type 1 thymidine kinase (HSV-1-tk) that can phosphorylate isotope labeled pyrimidine analogs like [124 I] FIAU or [18 F] FHBG and thereby trap them in transplanted cells XREF_BIBR.
